template: UPDATE batchrecipe SET  date ='{{time}}', name = '{{flow.recipename}}' , tanksize = '{{flow.recipetanksize}}', pump1 = '{{flow.recipepumpval1}}' ,pump2 = '{{flow.recipepumpval2}}' ,pump3 = '{{flow.recipepumpval3}}' ,pump4 = '{{flow.recipepumpval4}}' ,pump5 = '{{flow.recipepumpval5}}' ,pump6 = '{{flow.recipepumpval6}}',pump7 = '{{flow.recipepumpval7}}',pump8 = '{{flow.recipepumpval8}}',pump9 = '{{flow.recipepumpval9}}',pump10 = '{{flow.recipepumpval10}}' ,pump11 = '{{flow.recipepumpval11}}' ,pump12 = '{{flow.recipepumpval12}}' ,pump13 = '{{flow.recipepumpval13}}',pump14 = '{{flow.recipepumpval14}}',pump15 = '{{flow.recipepumpval15}}' ,pump16 = '{{flow.recipepumpval16}}' ,pump17 = '{{flow.recipepumpval17}}' ,pump18 = '{{flow.recipepumpval18}}' ,pump19 = '{{flow.recipepumpval19}}' ,pump20 = '{{flow.recipepumpval20}}' WHERE  name = '{{flow.originalname}}';

topic: SELECT * FROM pumpset ORDER BY id

func:
var m = msg.payload
delete msg.topic
    switch (m.id){
        case 1:
            msg.payload = m.speed
            return [msg]
        break;
        case 2:
            msg.payload = m.speed
            return [null,msg]
        break;

            msg.payload = m.speed

        break;

            return [null,null,null,null,null,null,null,null,null,null,null,null,null,null,msg]
        break;

            msg.payload = m.speed
            return [null,null,null,null,null,null,null,null,null,null,null,null,null,null,null,msg]

        break;
        case 19:
            msg.value = m.speed
            msg.payload = m.speed
            return [null,null,null,null,null,null,null,null,null,null,null,null,null,null,null,null,null,null,msg]
        break;
        case 20:
            msg.value = m.speed
            msg.payload = m.speed
            return [null,null,null,null,null,null,null,null,null,null,null,null,null,null,null,null,null,null,null,msg]
        break;
    }

SELECT * FROM pumpset ORDER BY id

name: loop
func:
delete msg.topic
 var d = new Date();

global.set('pumpstart',d.getTime())
var m = msg.payload
var tank = global.get('tanksizeset')
function sleep(ms) {
  return new Promise(resolve => setTimeout(resolve, ms));
}

var pumpselvalue = [global.get('pumpset1'),global.get('pumpset2'),global.get('pumpset3'),global.get('pumpset4'),global.get('pumpset5'),global.get('pumpset6'),global.get('pumpset7'),global.get('pumpset8'),global.get('pumpset9'),global.get('pumpset10'),global.get('pumpset11'),global.get('pumpset12'),global.get('pumpset13'),global.get('pumpset14'),global.get('pumpset15'),global.get('pumpset16'),global.get('pumpset17'),global.get('pumpset18'),global.get('pumpset19'),global.get('pumpset20')]
delete msg.payload

for ( var i = 0; i < m.length ; i++){
  

returnmsg(m[i].id,m[i].speed,pumpselvalue[i] )
await sleep(context.get('delaybetweenpumps'))
}


function returnmsg(id,setting,selvalue){
    console.log( setting + ' FUNCTION CALLED' + id + ' ' + selvalue)
    switch(id){
case 1: 
    var d1 = new Date();
    var msg1= {}
    msg1.pumppermin = setting
    console.log ('setting ' + setting)
    msg1.pumppersecond = 60/ setting
    msg1.selectedvalue= selvalue
    finalseconds = (60/ setting ) * (selvalue * 1000)
    console.log ('final ' + finalseconds + 'X '  )
    msg1.delay = (tank * finalseconds)
    msg1.payload = 'ON'
    
    msg1.topic = "switch.pump1"
    node.send( [msg1],false )
    global.set('pumpstart1',d1.getTime())
    global.set('pump1delay',tank * finalseconds)
    break 
case 2: 
    var d2 = new Date();
    var msg2= {}
    msg2.pumppermin = setting
    msg2.selectedvalue= selvalue
    msg2.pumppersecond = 60/ setting
    finalseconds = (60/ setting ) * selvalue * 1000
    msg2.delay = tank * finalseconds
    msg2.payload = 'ON'
    msg2.topic='switch.pump2'
    node.send( [msg2],false )
    global.set('pumpstart2',d2.getTime())
    global.set('pump2delay',tank * finalseconds)
    break
